name: Material Design Input - Interaction
description:
First file posted for the community, be indulgent.

 

I explain how to create material design type inputs. The file is a fairly complex mini UI kit, which is based on atomic design and the nesting of components.

For the moment no guidelines in the file, I may add some, tell me if you need them.


The goal is not to copy the material design style but to copy the interaction, you are free to customize the inputs and the animations!


Features:

- Transitions

- Variant & Boolean (config2022)

- Smart animate

- Micro-interactions


Share your feedback with me.
